name: Pic-Me
description: A time killing app where users can share images, add captions, and like others to compete on a global leader board.

name: Mile$
description: An intuitive logging app for drivers to record their individual trips and collected tips.

name: Click
description: A Garbage Pail Kids themed memory game built with React.js.

name: Peel
description: A simple CRUD application letting users save scraped articles from The Onion Parody Newsletter. Users can save favorites and add notes to selected favorite article.
